channel.title: Cool Locations! (Coordinates)
channel.description:
:D [b][u]Hey Guys![/u][/b][i] (And Girls!)[/i] Today, I was thinking to myself. And I was just curious what some cool location coordinates are :) Like, TzHaar, or.. The Mime Theatre.. Places like that XD - And I wondered if anyone has their own, unique, pretty cool location coordinates that they know! :) So, I've created this thread, so that people may post coordinates to a place they think is unique. ;D Lets begin :D I'll start us off, by posting a location I like, and the coordinates to it. Then, all of you may follow on. Posting locations you like, and coordinates to that place :) I feel this'll be a great help to newcomers, who are looking for locations to base their server on. OR - It could just bring help to people who would like a change of scenary in their server :) Alright, heres mine!
A Frosty.. Cold.. Icey area ~ Once used in the 'Desert Treasure' quest. :D [code] 2856,3808 [/code]
[i]Lets see what you guys can come up with![/i] [b][u]YOU MAY NOW POST YOUR LOCATION COORDINATES! :D[/u][/b]

item.title: Cool Locations! (Coordinates)
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Fail to see a develepmont? Well, you’re the one who’s failing I mean, coordinates that are posted here can help develop new server locations ~ This is initially a thread for people to share with others some pretty cool locations. And, it is also a place for players to request a location coordinate - So that they may use it in their server And Help, Develop Their server to become more unique :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2007, 06:16:37 PM[/size][hr][quote=“LeScape, post:2, topic:163185”]I /fail to see the developement…[/quote] So, without futhur a-doo I will now ask you to LEAVE

Read full topic

item.title: Cool Locations! (Coordinates)
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Hey Guys! (And Girls!)
Today, I was thinking to myself. And I was just curious what some cool location coordinates are Like, TzHaar, or… The Mime Theatre… Places like that XD - And I wondered if anyone has their own, unique, pretty cool location coordinates that they know! So, I’ve created this thread, so that people may post coordinates to a place they think is unique. ;D
Lets begin I’ll start us off, by posting a location I like, and the coordinates to it. Then, all of you may follow on. Posting locations you like, and coordinates to that place I feel this’ll be a great help to newcomers, who are looking for locations to base their server on.
OR - It could just bring help to people who would like a change of scenary in their server
Alright, heres mine!

A Frosty… Cold… Icey area ~ Once used in the ‘Desert Treasure’ quest. 

2856,3808

Lets see what you guys can come up with!
YOU MAY NOW POST YOUR LOCATION COORDINATES!

Read full topic
